Description:
Exellent Condition Part of the SA Multi-Franchise Motor Group Recommendation- we will arrange pre approved finance in need be This is a one of a kind vehicle, very clean and well maintained. A well looked after vehicle, looks and smells new and drives like a dream. The vehicle is priced better than any other vehicle on Autotrader and Surf 4 Cars. We automatically sent your financial details to all the banks and we assist you in obtaining the best finance deal in the market with pre-approved finance. Extended 1 or 2 year warranties are available on request.Amelda +27 82 321 0455 or Magda 0768329781 Gauteng branch Thanks. Mark Greeff m.greeff@hotmail.com Part of the SA Multi-Franchise Motor Group. attributes.description: Finance can be arranged. Excludes administration, delivery, and License Registration Fees. 80 Point quality check. Very neat. Tradeins accepted. Test drives welcome. Nationwide delivery. Finance Is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please Come and visit our preowned manager and our business manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylormade deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our bistro. Tradeins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our finance and insurance manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Auto Baltic Midrand.

attributes.description: Contact the Group 1 Sales team by filing in the form, we typically call you back within a few minutes. Look out for our call from the 27 600 number. We can offer you the best finance options to suit your needs. No need to sell your car privately, we offer fair and transparent trade in prices. One of our Sales consultants can come too you in the comfort of your own home or at your place of work so that you can view the car in a nonpressurized environment. We can arrange Nationwide delivery. All our cars undergo a Multipoint mechanical check to insure the best peace of mind. Become a part of the Group 1 Family today TsCs Apply. Call us on 021 903 0500
